verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Who shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> for us <S%H8462>first<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, to fight against <S%H3898>them<s%>?
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%>: <S%H5414>behold<s%>, I have delivered the <S%H776>land<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, Come <S%H5927>up<s%> with me into my <S%H1486>lot<s%>, that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>; and I likewise will <S%H1980>go<s%> with thee into thy <S%H1486>lot<s%>. So <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> went with <S%H3212>him<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> of them in <S%H966>Bezek<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

And they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H137>Adoni-bezek<s%> in <S%H966>Bezek<s%>; and they <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H5221>him<s%>, and they smote the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>.

But <S%H137>Adoni-bezek<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>; and they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H270>him<s%>, and caught <S%H7112>him<s%>, and cut off his <S%H931>thumbs<s%> and his great <S%H7272>toes<s%>.

And <S%H137>Adoni-bezek<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>, having their <S%H931>thumbs<s%> and their great <S%H7272>toes<s%> cut <S%H7112>off<s%>, <S%H3950>gathered<s%> their food under my <S%H7979>table<s%>: as I have <S%H6213>done<s%>, so <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7999>requited<s%> <S%H935>me<s%>. And they brought him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and he died <S%H4191>there<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5221>it<s%>, and smote it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H7971>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>, and in the <S%H5045>South<s%>, and in the <S%H8219>lowland<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> against the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> (now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>beforetime<s%> was <S%H7153>Kiriath-arba<s%>); and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H8344>Sheshai<s%>, and <S%H289>Ahiman<s%>, and <S%H8526>Talmai<s%>.

And from thence he <S%H3212>went<s%> against the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%>. (Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H6440>beforetime<s%> was <S%H7158>Kiriath-sepher<s%>.)

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, He that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> <S%H7158>Kiriath-sepher<s%>, and <S%H3920>taketh<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>, to him will I give <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%>, <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>'s <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>, <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>: and he gave him <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And it came to <S%H935>pass<s%>, when she came unto <S%H5496>him<s%>, that she moved him to <S%H7592>ask<s%> of her <S%H1>father<s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%>: and she <S%H6795>alighted<s%> from off her <S%H2543>ass<s%>; and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> said unto <S%H559>her<s%>, What wouldest thou?

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3051>him<s%>, Give me a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>; for that thou hast <S%H5414>set<s%> me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%>, <S%H5414>give<s%> me also <S%H1543>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>. And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H5942>upper<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%> and the <S%H8482>nether<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H7017>Kenite<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>brother-in<s%>-law, went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H8558>palm-trees<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which is in the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H6166>Arad<s%>; and they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H6857>Zephath<s%>, and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H8034>it<s%>. And the name of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah<s%>.

Also <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> with the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H831>thereof<s%>, and Ashkelon with the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H6138>thereof<s%>, and Ekron with the border <S%H1366>thereof<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was with <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; and drove <S%H3423>out<s%> the inhabitants of the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>; for he could <S%H3808>not<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%>, because they had <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>.

And they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> unto <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>, as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: and he <S%H3423>drove<s%> out thence the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> did not drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> that <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; but the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, they also went <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>; and Jehovah was with <S%H3068>them<s%>.
And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> sent to <S%H8446>spy<s%> out <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>. (Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6440>beforetime<s%> was <S%H3870>Luz<s%>.)

And the <S%H8104>watchers<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>him<s%>, Show <S%H3996>us<s%>, we pray thee, the entrance into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and we will <S%H6213>deal<s%> kindly with <S%H2617>thee<s%>.

And he <S%H7200>showed<s%> them the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>; and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; but they let the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> and all his <S%H4940>family<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof <S%H3870>Luz<s%>, which is the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> did not drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the inhabitants of <S%H1052>Beth-shean<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, nor of <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>; but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in that <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3478>pass<s%>, when Israel was waxed <S%H2388>strong<s%>, that they <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> to <S%H4522>taskwork<s%>, and did not <S%H3423>utterly<s%> drive them <S%H3423>out<s%>.

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> drove not <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer<s%>; but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer<s%> among <S%H7130>them<s%>.

Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> drove not <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7003>Kitron<s%>, nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5096>Nahalol<s%>; but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H4522>them<s%>, and became subject to taskwork.

Asher <S%H836><s%> drove not <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5910>Acco<s%>, nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon<s%>, nor of <S%H303>Ahlab<s%>, nor of <S%H392>Achzib<s%>, nor of <S%H2462>Helbah<s%>, nor of <S%H663>Aphik<s%>, nor of <S%H7340>Rehob<s%>;
but the <S%H843>Asherites<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; for they did not drive them <S%H3423>out<s%>.

Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> drove not <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>, nor the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1043>Beth-anath<s%>; but he <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: nevertheless the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> and of <S%H1043>Beth-anath<s%> became subject to <S%H4522>taskwork<s%>.

And the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H3905>forced<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>; for they would not <S%H5414>suffer<s%> them to come <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6010>valley<s%>;

but the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2776>Heres<s%>, in <S%H357>Aijalon<s%>, and in <S%H8169>Shaalbim<s%>: yet the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3513>prevailed<s%>, so that they became subject to <S%H4522>taskwork<s%>.
And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> was from the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H4610>Akrabbim<s%>, from the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and <S%H4605>upward<s%>.
